document_data.name: Al'Aif
document_data.mainbody:
'''Al'Aif''' was a warrior [[Mtair Dhafir]] tribe during the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|The invaders will make drudges of our [[camel]]s and slaves of our warriors. I would rather die with my enemy's blood on my blade.|Al'Aif on acquiescing to the [[Zhentarim]].}}
document_data.Description: He was considered to be the most fearsome Mtairi warrior during his time. His face bore a scar brought on by the slash of a dagger as well as four claw marks that were left by a [[lion]].
document_data.Personality: Al'Aif was a man of honor that believe that people should honor the traditional ways of the Bedine. He was particularly distrustful of all forms of magic.
document_data.Relationships: Al'Aif garnered great trust and respect from Sheikh [[Sabkhat]], leader of the Mtairi people.
